definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Current point-to-point information integration does not easily lead to IT asset reuse.
sentences.chinese: 当前的点对点信息集成不容易导致IT资产的复用。

sentences.english: Did you think the illegal problem when download music from peer to peer engine?
sentences.chinese: 使用点对点下载时，有没有考虑过下载音乐是否合法？

sentences.english: This function is defined by a point-by-point correspondence of two unities in space.
sentences.chinese: 这种功用被定义为空间的两个一致实体点对点的对应。

sentences.english: Delivering pattern of 'Point-to-Point' makes for the full use of customer advertising resources.
sentences.chinese: 点对点的传递方式，有利于客户广告资源的充分利用。

sentences.english: The research on ABR multipoint-to-point congestion control is in its early phase.
sentences.chinese: ABR多点对点连接的拥塞控制研究尚处于起步阶段。

sentences.english: Point-to-point unicast messages have been conventionally used to achieve barrier synchronization.
sentences.chinese: 过去一直用点对点单点传送信息取得屏蔽同步。

sentences.english: Realize that reading is not from beginning to end, but rather point to point .
sentences.chinese: 要认识到阅读不一定是从头读到尾，而是点对点。

sentences.english: An in-game option has been added to control peer-to-peer transferring.
sentences.chinese: 一个游戏选项界面加入到点对点传输控制界面中。

sentences.english: So we can use point-to-point models to characterize these collective communications.
sentences.chinese: 可以通过选择点对点通信模型来描述聚合通信。

sentences.english: Many practitioners are still living in the realm of traditional point-to-point data requirements.
sentences.chinese: 许多专业人士仍以过去点对点式的数据需求来看问题。

sentences.english: We are going 'point to point' from a source to one or two receivers, " Edelson said."
sentences.chinese: 我们打算‘点对点’从源到一个或两个接收器来传播。

definition: to encrypt/encryption/to protect with a password
crowdsourcing/abbr. for 群眾外包|群众外包[qun2 zhong4 wai4 bao1]
